trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered>evento può essere annullato impostando la <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered>

trans-unit.source: However, if the event is cancelled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> will not change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se l'evento viene annullato, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>non modificherà il il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The previous display position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La posizione di visualizzazione precedente il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new display position for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La nuova posizione di visualizzazione per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.
Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> in fase di riordinamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> that is being reordered.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> in fase di riordinamento.
Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> in fase di riordinamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new display position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione di visualizzazione di nuovo il<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered>evento può essere annullato impostando la <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered>

trans-unit.source: However, if the event is cancelled, the NewDisplayIndex will not change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se l'evento viene annullato, il NewDisplayIndex non diventerà il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new display position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La nuova posizione di visualizzazione di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous display position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione di visualizzazione precedente il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered>evento può essere annullato impostando la <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered>

trans-unit.source: However, if the event is cancelled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> will not change to the OldDisplayIndex value.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se l'evento viene annullato, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>non cambia il valore OldDisplayIndex.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>
